name: natter
content:
Add to word list

to talk continuously for a long time without any particular purpose: Once he starts nattering you just can't stop him. My mother and her friends natter away on the phone all evening. Synonym
chat

friendly conversation without any particular purpose, or an example of this: We had a long natter over coffee. Dinner consisted of pasta and salad and then we had a good natter. Synonym
chat
More examplesFewer examplesCoffee morning natter is being replaced by online chatter on social networking websites. If you are free a little later and fancy a proper natter, give me a shout.You might have a little natter with him - but only for a couple of minutes.
